result.title: Equity Residential: One Of America's Best Apartment REITs Is On Sale
result.text: Equity Residential is a high-quality REIT trading at a discount due to short-term supply and demand concerns, creating a buying opportunity. EQR boasts a strong balance sheet, high occupancy, premium assets, and a secure, growing dividend yield near five-year highs. Despite modest guidance cuts, EQR expects steady FFO growth, benefits from demographic trends, and offers a compelling rent-versus-own value proposition.

result.title: Baron Real Estate Income Fund Q3 2025 Top Contributors And Detractors
result.text: In the third quarter, the shares of Welltower, an operator of senior housing, life science, and medical office real estate properties, continued to significantly outperform both the REIT and broader equity indices. Since the beginning of 2025, we have noted that the shares of Wynn Resorts, the pre-eminent luxury global owner and operator of integrated resorts, were, in our opinion, too cheap. The shares of Prologis, a best-in-class industrial REIT, performed well in the most recent quarter following strong business results and indications that business prospects may improve in the year ahead.

result.title: Equity Residential: Buying Opportunity In Class-A Apartments
result.text: Equity Residential is upgraded to a "Strong Buy," offering rare value and upside amid broader market overvaluation. EQR benefits from strong apartment demand, a diversified coastal/Sunbelt portfolio, and resilient leasing spreads, supporting steady growth. The stock trades at a historically high 4.5% yield, with potential for 50% upside from multiple expansion.

result.title: Equity Residential: Buy High Quality At A Discount
result.text: Equity Residential is trading near its 52-week low, offering a 4.5% dividend yield and a discounted forward P/FFO of 15.6. EQR's focus on high-barrier coastal markets, high-income tenants, and strong occupancy provides stability and resilience amid market volatility. Operational efficiencies, including AI-driven leasing and delinquency management, bolster EQR's cost structure and support a well-covered dividend.

result.title: Buy 7 Barron's Better Bets (Than T-Bills) From 15 'Safer' Of 23 September Dividend Dogs
result.text: Seven of the top fifteen Barron's Better Bets (BBB) dividend 'dogs' - including CAG, PFE, VZ, BMY, UDR, KIM, and KEY - are attractively priced for income investors. Analyst forecasts project 17.61% to 34.78% net gains for top-ten BBB dogs by September 2026, with an average estimated gain of 23.96% and lower-than-market volatility. Five of the lowest-priced, highest-yield BBB stocks - CAG, PFE, VZ, BMY, and LYB - are expected to outperform higher-priced peers, offering a 16.89% advantage in projected returns.
